content: Dear Mr. Anderson On behalf of Jeperson High School, I am writing this letter to request permission to conduct an industrial field trip in your factory. We hope to give some practical education to our students in regard to industrial procedures. With this purpose in mind, we believe your firm is ideal to carry out such a project. But of course, we need your blessing and support. 35 students would be accompanied by two teachers. And we would just need a day for the trip. I would really appreciate your cooperation. Sincerely, Mr. Ray Feynman

words.context: We hope to give some practical education to our students in regard to industrial procedures

words.meaning_en: recognize with gratitude; be grateful for
words.synonyms: treasure / take account / apprise / prize / apprize
